citation: Proclamation under the Personal Information Protection Amendment Act 2009 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Personal Information Protection Amendment Act 2009

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Personal Information Protection Amendment Act 2009 fix 15 July 2010 as the day on which that Act commences.

12 July 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LARA GIDDINGS

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 14 July 2010

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
